qa_pairs.question: Luivatra made an entire node out of Rust purely vibe-coded. Was that recent?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah, well, the only question is how secure is running it. I mean, if miners are going to run it, then yeah, well, probably a lot of hard forkish divergences with the reference clients. And yeah, so some divergence already now.

qa_pairs.question: So you got an APK we can download and run kind of thing?
qa_pairs.answer: No, it's just that you just need a URL after dApp and you go to your mobile wallet, you go to the dApp section, you paste the URL and you get the UI there. So you just need to sign the DEX and that's it.

qa_pairs.question: That's amazing, sir. That's fantastic. How long did that take you?
qa_pairs.answer: I told you it was vibe coded. So it took me maybe one hour because there are so many components which don't work in mobile. So for example, I was trying to build a card with a toggle and drop down. It doesn't support that.

qa_pairs.question: What about you, HQ? What's the recent thing besides the Android app that you built? So we're talking with AI, right?
qa_pairs.answer: So the last thing, I think the cart. 50% of the cart, the front end was done with AI. The back end logic for chain transaction and everything was done written manually, but most of the front end stuff was done with AI.

qa_pairs.question: So talking about AI agents, is there any way we can have AI agent on chain which can execute stuff based on logic? You just provide them?
qa_pairs.answer: Yeah, but what does it mean on-chain?

qa_pairs.question: Right, you said something on Twitter the other day, kushti, that says, if there's 100 times more developers being able to code on blockchains, then the only thing that stands out among blockchains now is the fundamentals of the blockchain, or something like that. What was your quote? Do you remember what that was?
qa_pairs.answer: Right, yeah, so ideas and yeah, they soundness, right? So you need for solid ideas and you need to be focused right on principles. So solid foundations and principles and well, the ideas should be sound economically and monetary wise, right?
